author: Crazy_Chris
title: Upgrade your track with lights
review:
Overview
Year of release: 1983
Last year in catalog: 1990
Set type: supplemental
Generation (within grey era): 2.0
Predecessor (within grey era): none
Successor (within grey era): none

Description
In addition to 7861, this set was intended to light up your track. It contains four light bricks and train signal masts. Of course, you can also light up your buildings.

Variants and alternate parts
As it was released in 1983, the light bricks must be always the newer version with three plug holes.
From 1980 to 1988, the box was made of styrofoam with a cardbox sleeve. From 1989, the box was redesigned without styrofoam.

Personal opinion
This is a nice add-on, because it adds realism. But if your track is lying on the floor, be careful when stepping over it...
